lead_paragraph: Zimbabwe captain Graeme Cremer won the toss and opted to bat on what is expected to be a flat pitch in the first test of the two-match series against New Zealand at the Queen's Sports Club on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Zimbabwe Win Toss, Elect to Bat in First Test Against NZ
headline.main: Zimbabwe Win Toss, Elect to Bat in First Test Against NZ

snippet: Zimbabwe captain Graeme Cremer won the toss and opted to bat on what is expected to be a flat pitch in the first test of the two-match series against New Zealand at the Queen's Sports Club on Thursday....
